titles.title: A resolution establishing a pilot program of fellowships under the House of Representatives for persons who are blind or deaf.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to Subcommittee on Personnel and Police.

bill.summary: 1/21/1987--Introduced. Establishes a pilot program for fellowships under the House of Representatives for persons who are blind or deaf. Requires the Committee on House Administration to report to the House on the effectiveness of, and the desirability of continuing, such program.
